original_title: ‘The Beatles Anthology’ project returns this year with new album release, doc and music video   | Euronews
article_summary: The Beatles are releasing a new Anthology compilation, 'Anthology 4', featuring thirteen rare and unreleased songs, along with a new book, documentary, and music video. The first three Anthology compilations were remastered by George Martin's son, Giles, and all four will be released in a box set in November. A documentary series, The Beatles Anthology, will be streamed on Disney+ on 26 November.</s>
